revision.comment: Fix styling to show sort icon
revision.text:
This is a '''list of NGC objects 1–1000''' from the [[New General Catalogue]] (NGC). The [[astronomical catalog]]ue is composed mainly of [[star cluster]]s, [[nebula]]e, and [[galaxies]]. Other objects in the catalogue can be found in the other subpages of the [[list of NGC objects]].
The constellation information in these tables is from ''The Complete New General Catalogue and Index Catalogue of Nebulae and Star Clusters by J. L. E. Dreyer'',<ref name="sinnott1988"> {{cite book |author=R. W. Sinnott, editor |title=The Complete New General Catalogue and Index Catalogue of Nebulae and Star Clusters by J. L. E. Dreyer |date=1988 |publisher=Sky Publishing Corporation and Cambridge University Press |isbn=978-0-933346-51-2 }}</ref> which was accessed using the VizieR Service.<ref>{{cite web |url=http://vizier.u-strasbg.fr/viz-bin/VizieR |title=VizieR Service |work=Strasbourg astronomical Data Center |accessdate=18 August 2015}}</ref> Galaxy morphological types and objects that are members of the [[Small Magellanic Cloud]] are identified using the ''NASA/IPAC Extragalactic Database''.<ref>{{cite web |url=http://nedwww.ipac.caltech.edu/ |title=NED |work=NED–NASA/IPAC Extragalactic Database |accessdate=18 August 2015}}</ref> The other data of these tables are from the [[SIMBAD Astronomical Database]]<ref>{{cite web |url=http://simbad.u-strasbg.fr/simbad/ |title=SIMBAD Astronomical Database |work=Strasbourg astronomical Data Center |accessdate=18 August 2015}}</ref> unless otherwise stated.
